author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Borderlands 4 is a looter shooter that revolves around… loot. But what happens when you can’t get your hard-earned Legendary drop because it got trapped out of bounds or behind an invisible wall? Desperate Borderlands 4 players are running into that exact problem and are now pleading with developer Gearbox for a fix.
title: Borderlands 4 Players Are Tearfully Waving Goodbye to Their Hard-Earned Legendary Loot as It Erupts From Bosses and Gets Trapped Out of Bounds

author: Lex Briscuso
description: Back to the Future was such a cultural phenomenon — but interestingly enough, there’s still mystery surrounding the production. Michael J. Fox, who played Marty McFly, recently published his memoir Future Boy: Back to the Future and My Journey Through the Space-Time Continuum, and in it he detailed something of an on-set feud with Crispin Glover, who played McFly’s father George.
title: 'His Methods Sometimes Created Friction' — Back to the Future Star Michael J. Fox Opens Up About On-Set 'Feud' With Crispin Glover, Who Played His Father George

description: Spider-Man cards are on the slide, and there's a non-TMNT Ninja Turtle in this week's Magic: The Gathering Market Watch.

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: The world of Fallout is a fictional one, but it deals with some very real and very serious issues, chief among them the threat of nuclear war. Now, the video game series is set for an official exhibition at pretty much the most appropriate place for it on earth: the National Atomic Testing Museum in Las Vegas.
title: Fallout Is Getting an Official, Bethesda-Backed Exhibition Complete With Easter Eggs at the National Atomic Testing Museum in Las Vegas

author: Christian Wait
description: As of Oct. 17, Alienware gaming PCs, laptops, and 4K monitors are on sale at Dell starting from $1,199.99. Save on MagSafe power banks from $14.99 and other tech deals from Amazon and Walmart.

author: Tom Phillips
description: Japanese fans playing Pokémon Legends Z-A have spotted a rare mention of Pikachu pooping. However, the game's English-language translation adjusts the dialogue — and instead simply references Pikachu having "tummy troubles."

description: The Pikachu with Grey Felt Hat promo card is selling for around $680 raw and over $1,000 graded. Originally tied to the Van Gogh Museum Pokémon event, this rare card is back on the rise after a year of steady growth.

author: Lex Briscuso
description: Warner Bros.' decision to shelve Adil El Arbi and Bilall Fallah’s Batgirl movie over three years ago was the shot heard around the world of cinema. The choice ignited a backlash from fans that has so far gone ignored — but one person involved in the film thinks there might be some potential for it to be released one day.
title: Batgirl Star Has 'Hope' for Film's Eventual Release After It Was Shelved 3 Years Ago: 'Hollywood's a Funny Place'

description: Double Fine's surreal puzzle platformer is a feast for the senses.
title: Keeper Review

author: Ryan McCaffrey
description: Based on our hands-on time with the newest preview build of Super Meat Boy 3D, we can confidently say this isn't just the same old Super Meat Boy. Instead, it’s shaping up to be a thoughtful reimagining that captures the essence of what makes the series beloved while embracing new possibilities that only 3D can offer.
title: Super Meat Boy 3D Makes Great Use of its Extra Dimension

author: Tom Phillips
description: Star Trek fans finally look set to discover what happened to Deep Space Nine captain Benjamin Sisko — a mystery left unanswered for more than 25 years.
title: Star Trek: Starfleet Academy Really Does Sound Like It Will Address Deep Space Nine's Biggest Mystery: What Happened to Benjamin Sisko?

description: Get ready for Stellar Blade 2 with this deal on the first game, down to its lowest price this year at Amazon ahead of Black Friday.

author: Adam Bankhurst
description: The Galaxies Showcase 2025 is nearly here, and it's set to feature more than 50 games, six world premieres, exclusive reveals, demo drops, and so much more. There is a lot to look forward to, and we're here to break down how you can watch the show and what to expect.
title: Galaxies Showcase 2025: How to Watch and What to Expect

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Sony is hoping to start filming of its live-action Horizon Zero Dawn movie in 2026 with a release at some point in 2027, according to a new court document.
title: Live-Action Horizon Zero Dawn Movie Has a 'Working Script,' Sony's Release Plans Revealed in New Court Document

author: Vikki Blake
description: Sony has asked the courts for a preliminary injunction against Light of Motiram maker Tencent to stop the Chinese megacorp from commencing pre-release promotion of the upcoming adventure game, filing its opposition to Tencent's motion to dismiss the high-profile copyright lawsuit.
title: Sony Blasts Tencent's 'Knock-off Horizon' Lawsuit Response As 'Nonsense,' Insists 'Damage Is Done' And Calls For Injunction

author: Jesse Schedeen
description: Batman: Revolution is the latest book to expand the world of Tim Burton's Batman. We've got an exclusive excerpt of the novel and a "Riddle Me This" word puzzle for Bat-fans to pick apart.

description: This sequel is another flawed but unique and remarkable bite at the apple.

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: George Lucas has said he’s let go of his instinct to manage Star Wars, 13 years after selling the sci-fi universe to Disney.
title: 'Disney Took It Over and They Gave It Their Vision. That's What Happens' — George Lucas Says He's 'Moved Past' His Instinct to Manage Star Wars, 13 Years After Selling Up

author: Tom Phillips
description: The owner of a high-profile social media account dedicated to sharing Pokémon leaks has boasted of having numerous images removed by The Pokémon Company today in response to copyright claims — something they say only proves the leaked details are legitimate.
title: 'They Took the Bait': Pokémon Leaker Insists They Deliberately Hosted Hacked Images to Draw The Pokémon Company's Legal Attention — and Confirm Details of Unannounced Games Are Legitimate

author: Scott Collura
description: Mr. Scorsese review: Across five hours, the Apple TV documentary series about Martin Scorsese becomes a detailed portrait of not just a legendary filmmaker, but of why his movies took the form they did.
title: Mr. Scorsese Review

author: Tom Phillips
description: The fear that Stranger Things might tank its reputation with a dodgy Season 5 finale was a concern for the show's cast, star Finn Wolfhard has admitted, after seeing Game of Thrones' final season brutally "torn to shreds."
title: Stranger Things Star Admits 'Everyone Was Pretty Worried' About Wrapping Up the Show Well With Season 5, After Seeing Game of Thrones' Final Season 'Torn to Shreds'

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: The developers of Battlefield 6 have reversed course on controversial changes to Conquest mode after a backlash from players.
title: Battlefield 6 Recently Patched Conquest Mode to Make the Matches Shorter, the Community Complained, and Now the Developers Have Reversed the Decision

description: Battlefield 6 developer Battlefield Studios has addressed XP and progression complaints by outlining plans for a number of key changes to the game.

author: Vikki Blake
description: A little over a year since Konami relaunched its long-dead Silent Hill horror series with the superb Silent Hill 2 Remake, the publisher has provided a sales update, confirming that it's now up to 2.5 million worldwide.
title: Silent Hill 2 Remake Sales Hit 2.5 Million as Franchise Surpasses 10 Million

author: Tom Phillips
description: Former Assassin's Creed boss Marc-Alexis Côté has made clear that his shock exit from Ubisoft was not his decision.
title: 'I Did Not Walk Away': Former Assassin's Creed Boss Says 'Ubisoft Asked Me to Step Aside' After 15 Years Working on the Franchise

author: Tom Phillips
description: If you've been anywhere on the internet this week, Pokémon Legends: Z-A leaks were probably hard to avoid — particularly Mega Starmie and its bizarrely humanoid legs.
title: Pokémon Legends: Z-A's Mega Starmie Is a Meme Now, Thanks to Its Horrible Legs

author: Vikki Blake
description: Marvel Rivals' first ever PvE mode drops on October 23, 2025, and it's based on the Marvel Zombies Disney+ TV show.
title: Marvel Rivals' First Ever PvE Mode Is Based on the Marvel Zombies Disney+ Show

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Pokémon Legends: Z-A is taking us back to a revamped Lumiose City. Of course, you can catch Pokémon, battle them and do quests, but there’s also time for relaxing. One aspect of the game that some Japanese fans have been getting excited about is simply chilling with your Pokémon outside an in-game cafe.
title: 'Is There Anything More Cruel?' — Japanese Pokémon Legends: Z-A Players Are Debating the Rights and Wrongs of Eating Food in Front of Your Pokémon

author: Michael Cripe
description: As players continue to deploy into Battlefield 6 multiplayer to try out its many maps, modes, and guns, they are finding a new enemy to fight: the sun.
title: Flashbang: Battlefield 6 Lighting Is So Bright That Players Feel Like They Have to Fight the Sun

author: Tristan Ogilvie
description: Dead Space Creator Glen Schofield Thinks the Games Industry is “Broken, Beaten, and Battered” but he has a three-point plan to fix it.
title: Dead Space Creator Glen Schofield Thinks the Games Industry is “Broken, Beaten, and Battered”

author: Luke Reilly
description: Unlike the original, The Crew 2 will be able to live on after its servers go dark.
title: The Crew 2 Offline Mode Now Available

author: Eric Song
description: One involves trade-in, another port-in, but the third could save you the most money in the long run.
title: T-Mobile "Apple iPhone 17 On Us" Deals Explained
